basics.name: Matt Shirley
basics.summary: Software developer specialized in testing with experience in JavaScript and Ruby

highlights: Developed and maintained a functional and integration test framework for a web application (Python, JavaScript)
Created a ChatOps tool to support the team in data creation and test processes (JavaScript)
Mentored testers in learning JavaScript, penetration testing and test development
Implemented a context-driven, risk-based test process to ensure accountability while performing exploratory testing
Championed growing an accessibility culture within the company
Reduced product backlog and developed features for a web application (React, JavaScript)
Implemented a unit and functional front-end test suite (Jest, Enzyme)
Analyzed development risk and performed exploratory testing on major builds

work.summary: Travelled throughout Canada while working seasonlly and as a web developer.
highlights: Developed small web applications for clients using React, Express and Ruby on Rails
Continued contract employment with Asia Pacific Digital providing technical consultation (JavaScript)
Worked seasonally as a Ski Lift Operator and volunteered for a variety of causes in local communities
Improved existing functionality by resolving bugs for a legacy web-application (JavaScript, PHP, SQL)
Oversaw the operations of servers and monitored functions to detect any possible errors
Communicated and performed troubleshooting with users to resolve defects

education.courses: Emphasis on system and database design, testing and web development (PHP, SQL)
